pip.explanation: Install a Python package using pip.
pip.note: Run in your terminal or command prompt.
pip.when_to_use: Use to upgrade to the latest version.

docker.note: Run in your terminal with Docker installed.

docker_compose.command:
# Download the configuration file and rename it as docker-compose.yml
C:\>Invoke-WebRequest https://github.com/milvus-io/milvus/releases/download/v2.4.15/milvus-standalone-docker-compose.yml -OutFile docker-compose.yml
# Start Milvus
C:\>docker compose up -d
Creating milvus-etcd  ... done
Creating milvus-minio ... done
Creating milvus-standalone ... done
docker_compose.note: Run these commands in order in your terminal or PowerShell. Make sure Docker Compose is installed.
docker_compose.when_to_use: Use to set up Milvus with Docker Compose.
